sense.def:
Custody
je zakonita pravica do nege otroka, zlasti pravica, dodeljena otrokovemu očetu ali materi po ločitvi.

seg.quote: Divorce courts usually award custody to mothers.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
in custody
, je bil aretiran in bo ostal v zaporu, dokler mu ne bodo sodili.

seg.quote: ...people who have been quite wrongly held in custody.
